  2. AI-generated 'workslop' is here. It's killing teamwork and causing a multimillion dollar productivity problem, researchers say  CNBC

  4. AI ‘Workslop’ Is Killing Productivity and Making Workers Miserable  404 Media
  5. AI tools aren’t making much of a difference for companies  Fast Company

item.title: Italy first in EU to pass comprehensive law regulating use of AI - The Guardian
item.description:
1. Italy first in EU to pass comprehensive law regulating use of AI  The Guardian
  2. Italy enacts AI law covering privacy, oversight and child access  Reuters
  3. Artificial intelligence bill approved by the Senate: updates on security, rights, and privacy. Here's what's new.  firstonline.info
  4. Italy’s Pioneering AI Law Raises Governance Concerns  Law.com
  5. What you should know about Italy's landmark AI law  The Local Italy
